data.title: Ohio University
data.meta_description: Named after Chillicothe's prominent Bennett family, Bennet Hall opened as the first building on the campus of Ohio University Chillicothe in September 1966. Classes were first offered in Bennett Hall on September 19, 1966, 20 years and three days after OHIO Chillicothe's first night classes took place at Chillicothe High School.
data.text:
Bennett Hall serves as the central location of all student activity. It houses Student Services, Accessibility Services, the Student Resource Center, and the Testing Center, as well as faculty and administrative offices, classrooms, and the OHIO Chillicothe Auditorium. Science and nursing labs are also located in Bennett Hall.

Named after Chillicothe's prominent Bennett family, Bennet Hall opened as the first building on the campus of Ohio University Chillicothe in September 1966. Classes were first offered in Bennett Hall on September 19, 1966, 20 years and three days after OHIO Chillicothe's first night classes took place at Chillicothe High School.
